Class bossMovement

java.lang.Object
game.bossMovement
All Implemented Interfaces:
city.cs.engine.CollisionListener, EventListener
public class bossMovement extends Object implements city.cs.engine.CollisionListener
The animation for the boss enemy.

  • Constructor Details

    • bossMovement

      public bossMovement(Boss boss, Player player)
      Initialises the animation of the boss enemy.

      creates and loads the animations for the attack and death animation updates the animation after short delays.

      Parameters:
      boss - the boss enemy
      player - the current player

  • Method Details

    • loadAttackFrame

      public void loadAttackFrame()
      loads the attack frames.

      for each of the frames in the attack array, display the image

    • loadDeathFrame

      public void loadDeathFrame()
      loads the death frames.

      for each of the frames in the death array, display the image

    • move

      public void move()
      boss enemy walking.

      if the boss enemy position is not dead, walk towards the right else stop walking.

    • collide

      public void collide(city.cs.engine.CollisionEvent e)
      collision method.

      if the boss enemy comes in contact with the player and the damage is true, the player loses a life.

      Specified by:
      collide in interface city.cs.engine.CollisionListener
      Parameters:
      e - The CollisionEvent contains details about the collision.
